name: Aloft Bengaluru Whitefield

reviews.text: This hotel was quite affordably priced compared to some of the other hotels nearby, but does not match them in quality.
reviews.title: Affordable hotel, but a few drawbacks

reviews.text: I could hear activity in the (connecting) room next door - shade being raised, as well as television. II was so exhausted most evenings, it didn't really matter.
reviews.title: Nice and affordable place

reviews.text: Food at hotel was very average. Breakfast was OK but in a warm room and so I skipped the coffee. There were two restaurants and because of the location of the hotel, didn't want to try go anywhere else. The food was just OK at dinner time - asked for one dish to be made less spicy, and it was still firey hot, and the meditteranean restaurant had a lot of choices, but didn't have anything spectatcular there after three dinners.
reviews.title: no frills in whitefield

reviews.text: Hotel had free internet access - that works for just two devices.
reviews.title: Only A BusinesS Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Power went out several times during the stay. I remember at least six times. There are no emergency lights, so the restaurant, bar, room all go pitch dark for about a minute, until either the generator kicks in or the power is restored. Seems like this is such a frequent event, there should be some emergency lights, but I suppose that is not in the building code in India.
reviews.title: Check out after five mins

reviews.text: My family and I stayed for over 1 month at this hotel so had a great insight into this hotel.
reviews.title: Great business hotel with family friendly attentive service

description: Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc.® added a new tWist in travel by announcing the opening of its second Aloft in India located at Bengaluru . Located in Whitefield, Aloft Bengaluru Whitefield introduces style at a steal to its guests with 166 spacious, loft-like rooms, accessible technology and a vibrant, social atmosphere. The hotel also offers 5700 Sq Feet of meeting space in Tactic and The Hub, 100 sqm of fitness space called re:charge. Guests can grab a drink with friends at the re:mix and w xyz bar or de-stress at splash, the pool. Featuring loft-like guest rooms, a buzzing bar scene in the open lobby, an urban-inspired grab-and go café and industrial design elements throughout, Aloft delivers urban-influenced, modern and vibrant designs and an energetic guest experience at an affordable price point.Aloft, the sizzling tech-savvy brand that has rocked the U.S. hospitality industry, made its debut in India in 2010 with Aloft Chennai OMR IT Expressway and Aloft Bengaluru Whitefield. Aimed at Generation Y, Aloft is Starwood’s design-led, social-experience brand that has enjoyed the fastest ramp-up of any brand in the hotel history. The centerpiece of the Aloft room is the ultra-comfortable signature bed. Large stylish bathrooms complement the guest experience with oversized walk-in showers and amenities created by bliss® spa. Each guest loft is also a combination of high-tech office and entertainment center, featuring wireless internet access and plug & play, a one-stop connectivity solution for multiple electronic gadgetry such as PDAs, cell phones, mp3 players and laptops - all linked to a large flat panel HDTV ready television for optimal sound and viewing.The hotel has multiple dinning experience coffe shop & speciality restaurant.
